pages.text: By default, this spell will extend your senses, granting you night vision for a period of time.$(br2)With modifiers, you can extend your vision further: highlight nearby hostile or passive entities (or both), and even specific types of blocks.$(br2)You can even reduce the distance at which entities can detect you.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:extension/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Night Vision:$() Night Vision is given for $(spell:extension/SECONDS/night_vision) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Animals:$() With the $(modifier:sense_animals)$() modifier, animals and passives within $(spell:extension/radius_animals_x) and $(spell:extension/radius_animals_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:extension/radius_animals_y) vertically are highlighted for $(spell:extension/SECONDS/animal_glow_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Enemies:$() With the $(modifier:sense_hostiles)$() modifier, hostile

entities within $(spell:extension/radius_hostiles_x) and $(spell:extension/radius_hostiles_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:extension/radius_hostiles_y) vertically are highlighted for$(spell:extension/SECONDS/enemy_glow_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Ores:$() With the $(modifier:sense_ores)$() modifier, ores within $(spell:extension/radius_ore_x) and $(spell:extension/radius_ore_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:extension/radius_ore_y) vertically are highlighted with particles.$(br2)$(bold)Held Ores:$() With the $(modifier:sense_ores)$() modifier, ores matching that of the one held in your off-hand within $(spell:extension/radius_ore_specific_x) and $(spell:extension/radius_ore_specific_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:extension/radius_ore_specific_y) vertically are highlighted.

$(bold)Liquids:$() With the $(modifier:sense_liquids)$() modifier, liquid blocks (such as lava or water) within $(spell:extension/radius_liquid_x) and $(spell:extension/radius_liquid_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:extension/radius_liquid_y) vertically are highlighted with particles.$(br2)$(bold)Spawners:$() With the $(modifier:sense_spawners)$() modifier, spawners within $(spell:extension/radius_spawner_x) and $(spell:extension/radius_spawner_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:extension/radius_spawner_y) vertically are highlighted with particles.$(br2)$(bold)Containers:$() With the $(modifier:sense_containers)$() modifier, containers within $(spell:extension/radius_container_x) and $(spell:extension/radius_container_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:extension/radius_container_y) vertically

are highlighted with particles.$(br2)$(bold)Plants:$() With the $(modifier:sense_plants)$() modifier, plants within $(spell:extension/radius_plants_x) and $(spell:extension/radius_plants_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:extension/radius_plants_y) vertically are highlighted with particles.$(br2)$(bold)Home:$() With the $(modifier:sense_home)$() modifier, particles are drawn pointing in the direction of your current spawn location.$(br2)$(bold)Time:$() With the $(modifier:sense_time)$() modifier, a message in chat will give you information about the current time and day.
